com.windowsazure.messaging

Interface INotificationHub

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NotificationHub

    public interface INotificationHub
    Interface for the REST wrapper of WIndows Azure Notification Hubs

      • createRegistrationId

        String createRegistrationId()
        Create a registrationId, without creating an actual registration. To create use upsert. This method is used when the registration id is stored only on the device.
        Returns:
        a registration id.

      • createRegistration

        Registration createRegistration(Registration registration)
        This method creates a new registration
        Parameters:
        registration - A registration object containing the description of the registration to create. ETag and registrationid are ignored
        Returns:
        the created registration containing the read-only parameters (registrationid, etag, and expiration time).

      • updateRegistration

        Registration updateRegistration(Registration registration)
        This methods updates an existing registration
        Parameters:
        registration - A registration object containing the description of the registration to update. The registration id has to be populated.
        Returns:
        the updated registration containing the read-only parameters (registrationid, etag, and expiration time).
        Throws:
        Runtime - exception if the registration already exists

      • upsertRegistration

        Registration upsertRegistration(Registration registration)
        This method updates or creates a new regiostration with the registration id specified.
        Parameters:
        registration - A registration object containing the description of the registration to create or update. The registration id has to be populated.
        Returns:
        the updated registration containing the read-only parameters (registrationid, etag, and expiration time).

      • deleteRegistration

        void deleteRegistration(Registration registration)
        Deletes a registration.
        Parameters:
        registration. - Registration id has to be populated.

      • deleteRegistration

        void deleteRegistration(String registrationId)
        Deletes a registration.
        Parameters:
        registrationId -

      • getRegistration

        Registration getRegistration(String registrationId)
        Retrieves the description of a registration based on the id.
        Parameters:
        registrationId -
        Returns:
        A registration object

      • getRegistrations

        CollectionResult getRegistrations()
        Return all registrations in this hub
        Returns:
        Registration collection.

      • getRegistrations

        CollectionResult getRegistrations(int top,
                                  String continuationToken)
        Returns all registrations in this hub
        Parameters:
        top - The maximum number of registrations to return (max 100)
        continuationToken - If not-null, continues iterating through a previously requested query.
        Returns:
        Registration collection.

      • getRegistrationsByTag

        CollectionResult getRegistrationsByTag(String tag)
        Returns all registrations with a specific tag
        Parameters:
        tag -
        Returns:
        Registration Collection

      • getRegistrationsByTag

        CollectionResult getRegistrationsByTag(String tag,
                                       int top,
                                       String continuationToken)
        Returns all registrations with a specific tag
        Parameters:
        tag -
        top - The maximum number of registrations to return (max 100)
        continuationToken - If not-null, continues iterating through a previously requested query.
        Returns:
        Registration Collection

      • getRegistrationsByChannel

        CollectionResult getRegistrationsByChannel(String channel)
        Returns all registration with a specific channel (e.g. ChannelURI, device token)
        Parameters:
        channel -
        Returns:
        Registration Collection

      • getRegistrationsByChannel

        CollectionResult getRegistrationsByChannel(String channel,
                                           int top,
                                           String continuationToken)
        Returns all registration with a specific channel (e.g. ChannelURI, device token)
        Parameters:
        channel -
        top - The maximum number of registrations to return (max 100)
        continuationToken - If not-null, continues iterating through a previously requested query.
        Returns:
        Registration Collection

      • sendNotification

        void sendNotification(Notification notification)
        Sends a notification to all eligible registrations (i.e. only correct platform, if notification is platform specific)
        Parameters:
        notification -

                      Set<String> tags)
        Sends a notifications to all eligible registrations with at least one of the specified tags

        notification -
        tags -
